howToPost.question: How do I post a new task?
howToPost.answer: Tap the '+' button at the bottom of the screen, choose a task category, add details, budget, and location. Your task will then be visible to nearby taskers.

howToEarn.question: How do I earn money as a tasker?
howToEarn.answer: Switch to Tasker mode from Settings, browse available tasks, and submit your offers. When your offer is accepted and you complete the task, you'll receive your earnings directly in your wallet.

platformFee.question: What are the platform fees?
platformFee.answer: THARWA keeps only 5% of each completed task value. The tasker receives 95% of the agreed amount.

howToSwitch.question: How do I switch between Client and Tasker mode?
howToSwitch.answer: Go to Settings and tap 'Switch to Tasker Mode' or 'Switch to Client Mode'. You can switch at any time.

verification.question: Why should I verify my identity?
verification.answer: Identity verification increases client trust in you as a tasker and gives you a 'Verified' badge on your profile. This helps you get more tasks.

rating.question: How does the rating system work?
rating.answer: After completing each task, both client and tasker can rate each other. A high rating helps you get more opportunities.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At THARWA, we are committed to protecting your privacy and personal data. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.content:
We collect the following information:
• Account information (name, email, phone number)
• Location information to show nearby tasks
• Task and transaction history
• Chat messages between users

dataUsage.title: Data Usage
dataUsage.content:
We use your data to:
• Provide and improve our services
• Connect clients with nearby taskers
• Process payments and transactions
• Communicate with you about your account and tasks
• Ensure platform security

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing
dataSharing.content:
We do not sell your personal data. We may share limited information with:
• Other users when communicating about a task
• Payment service providers to complete transactions
• Legal authorities when officially requested

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We use advanced encryption technologies to protect your data. All communications are encrypted and we follow security best practices.

userRights.title: Your Rights
userRights.content:
You have the right to:
• Access your personal data
• Correct any inaccurate information
• Request deletion of your account and data
• Opt out of marketing communications

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: We use cookies to improve your experience and remember your preferences. You can manage cookie settings through your browser.

changes.title: Policy Changes
changes.content: We may update this policy from time to time. We will notify you of any significant changes through the app or email.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content:
If you have any questions about this privacy policy, you can contact us at:
• Email: privacy@tharwa.app
• Phone: +966 11 000 0000

terms.title: Terms & Conditions
terms.intro: Welcome to THARWA. By using our app, you agree to comply with these terms and conditions. Please read them carefully.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By using or registering for the THARWA app, you agree to comply with these terms and our privacy policy. If you do not agree to any of these terms, please do not use the app.

eligibility.title: Eligibility
eligibility.content: You must be 18 years or older to use THARWA. By using the app, you confirm that you meet this requirement and that the information you provide is true and accurate.

accounts.title: Accounts
accounts.content:
• You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information
• You must not share your login credentials with anyone
• We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate these terms
• Registration information must be accurate and up-to-date

services.title: Services
services.content:
THARWA is a platform that connects clients with taskers. We are not a party to contracts between users and are not responsible for the quality of work performed. Users are responsible for:
• Agreeing on task details
• Communicating clearly
• Completing tasks as agreed

payments.title: Payments
payments.content:
• The platform retains 5% of each completed transaction
• The tasker receives 95% of the agreed amount
• Earnings are transferred to the tasker's wallet upon task completion
• Clients must have sufficient balance to complete a task

conduct.title: Code of Conduct
conduct.content:
All users must:
• Treat other users with respect
• Provide honest and accurate information
• Not engage in any illegal activity
• Not use the platform for fraud or deception
• Comply with all local laws

liability.title: Liability
liability.content:
THARWA is not responsible for:
• Quality of work performed between users
• Any disputes between clients and taskers
• Any losses resulting from platform use
• Any content posted by users

termination.title: Termination
termination.content:
We reserve the right to terminate or suspend your account at any time if you:
• Violate these terms and conditions
• Provide false information
• Engage in fraudulent activities
• Misuse the platform in any way

disputes.title: Disputes
disputes.content: In case of any dispute, we encourage users to contact us first for an amicable resolution. These terms are governed by the laws of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
